subject: Holocaust and the Nazi Era
Baseball
Nuremberg War Crimes Tribunal (1945-49)
World Series
lead_paragraph: For two American chaplains at Nuremberg prison in Germany, the climactic end of the initial phase of postwar judgment coincided with Game 7 of the 1946 World Series.
snippet: For two American chaplains at Nuremberg prison in Germany, the climactic end of the initial phase of postwar judgment coincided with Game 7 of the 1946 World Series.
